datafield.subfield: Relativistic Corrections to Pair Charmonium Production at the LHC

On the basis of perturbative QCD and relativistic quark model we calculaterelativistic and bound state corrections to processes of a pair $S$-wavecharmonium production at~the~LHC. The obtained result for $J/\psi$pair production at the energy $\sqrt S=7$~TeV lies below the experimentalvalue measured by LHCb collaboration. In the case of $\eta_c$ pairthe examined effects decrease total nonrelativistic cross sectionmore than two times and on 20 percents in the rapidity region of LHCbdetector.T = Relativistic Corrections to Pair Charmonium Production at the LHC
Helmholtz International School on Physics of Heavy Quarks and Hadrons, Dubna, 2013-07-15 - 2013-07-28
3c: C13-07-15.9 ? (Helmholtz International Summer School on Physics of Heavy Quarks and Hadrons)
